SEARCH
Package access

Class DrinkDAO

java.lang.Object
access.DrinkDAO
public class DrinkDAO extends Object
Data Access object for the drinks database table -Displays drinks to the user Example usage: DrinkDAO drinkDAO = new DrinkDAO(); List drinks = drinkDAO.getAllDrinks();

  • Method Details

    • getAllDrinks

      public List<Drink> getAllDrinks() throws SQLException
      Fetches a list of all the drinks in the database
      Returns:
      List of Drink objects that represent all drinks in the database and their attributes
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • updateDrink

      public void updateDrink(int drink_id, String drink_name, int drink_category_id, double drink_price) throws SQLException
      Fetches a list of all the drinks in the database
      Parameters:
      drink_id - int representing the id of the drink to update
      drink_name - string of the name to update the drink to
      drink_category_id - int of the new drink category id
      drink_price - double of the new price of the drink
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
